thread.title: Patriots sign Brandon King from practice squad
thread.title_full: Patriots sign Brandon King from practice squad

title: Patriots sign Brandon King from practice squad
text:
Patriots sign Brandon King from practice squad, release Bradley Fletcher 
THE ASSOCIATED PRESS Published: 10/10/15 7:30 pm EDT - Updated: 10/10/15 7:30 pm EDT 
FOXBOROUGH, Massachusetts â€” The New England Patriots signed defensive back Brandon King from the practice squad Saturday and released veteran defensive back Bradley Fletcher . 
The 22-year-old King signed as a rookie free agent out of Auburn in May. He released Sept. 5 and signed to the practice squad Sept. 7. 
The 29-year-old Fletcher signed as an unrestricted free agent from Philadelphia in March. He played in two of the Patriots' first three games, making 10 tackles and forcing a fumble. He has played 73 games, making 54 starts, in seven seasons with St. Louis, Philadelphia and New England. 
New England is at Dallas on Sunday.
